comment: Had him for a pilot python based CSE 1321/1321L class. Grade based on couple HW, individually coded game, and a group coded game. Ask him questions and he will be ready to answer. Went through the whole 1321 material in about 8 weeks, but it still felt like we learned everything we needed to.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Not a bad professor, had him for a pilot python based CSE 1321/1321L class, where the criteria of the course was much different than regular 1321 classes. Grade based on a few homework assignments, an individually coded game, a group game that is shown off at an "exhibition", a midterm and final, and a few professional development quizzes.
